Name: Isomorph
About the game: Isomorph is an atmospheric 3D puzzle-platformer. Solve dozens of challenging puzzles by changing the direction of gravity and manipulating physics, while being immersed in a calming ambient environment. Features: 24 puzzles, yielding 6-8 hours of gameplay A gun that can collect and place cubes Gravity, Antigravity, and Nongravity cubes Interactive lasers, pressure plates, and timers A calming ambient soundtrack which evolves as the game progresses Steam Cloud, Achievements, and Trading Cards Windows, Mac, and Linux Support
Meta Title: Isomorph: Sep 2, 2016, Buce Studios LLC and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Isomorph? Check out the release date (Sep 2, 2016), developer insights from Buce Studios LLC, and a complete game summary.
